title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a simple Pythonic API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration for Ollama. Use local Ollama models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. Manage models, chat, and share conversations in the browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat, generate, pull, and list models from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama. Chat and generate completions with local models in Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and tab completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code and JetBrains.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library for Ollama. Chat and generate with local models inside Phoenix and LiveView apps.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama. Simple API to chat and generate completions in native Nim applications.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama. Type-safe client for chat, generate, pull, and embed with local models.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama. Chat and generate with local models in mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama. Simple C# wrapper to chat and generate completions in .NET apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that bridges channels to any Ollama model using Bolt framework and Socket Mode.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and get inline completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG starter kit using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents locally.
